body.p: We believe that we have created for technical documentation writers useful AI-based tools in order both to enhance the editing experience and to offset AI-powered assistants for the published documentation.

This presentation created by George Bina and titled AI-Powered XML Editing provides a high level overview of the most important AI related features we have implemented in our application in the last years. I am embedding it below for our clients and integrators to also have a general understanding of the AI-Powered XML Editing tools we are offering.
